title: AZURE Hyaluronic & Retinol Anti Aging Under Eye Pads- Moisturizing & Rejuvenating Eye Mask Patches - Reduces Fine Lines, Wrinkles, Dark Circles & Puffiness - Skin Care Made in Korea - 5 Pairs
features: UNDER EYE PATCHES FOR DARK CIRCLES AND PUFFINESS: Our anti-wrinkle patches are specially formulated to smooth the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, dark circles, and under-eye puffiness. Our under-eye pads help lift, firm, and restore your skin's natural, youthful glow.

PREMIUM ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Our skincare products are made from high-quality ingredients. Our under-eye masks are infused with Hyaluronic Acid, which hydrates, replenishes, and locks in moisture while revitalizing the skin’s surface, while Retinol helps to even skin tone and lighten the appearance of dark spots.

EASY TO USE: Before using our under-eye mask, thoroughly rinse and dry your face and remove any traces of eye makeup. Place pads under both eyes and adjust to fit comfortably. Allow to sit for 10-15 minutes. Once finished, remove the pads and massage the remaining product into the skin. No need to rinse.

CLEAN BEAUTY SKIN CARE: We know how important it is to be conscious about what goes on your face. We've created our skincare set with clean, 95% natural, vegan, and cruelty-free ingredients. Our facial skincare products contain no parabens, phthalates, and GMOs.
OUR PROMISE: We stand behind every product we make. If our products fail to live up to your expectations, you may reach out to us, and we’ll make it right - no questions asked!
